betterquesting:10.desc:8: Craft a Crafting Unit! This item can be further crafted into Crafting Storage, a Crafting Co-Processing Unit, and a Crafting Monitor. Using these items, create a rectangular shape that contains at least one Crafting Storage of any kind. These mulitblocks control your crafting, the more complicated a crafting request is, the more Crafting Storage you'll need. Just attach one of these multiblocks onto your ME System, and you're able to craft now (see: Molecular Assembler part). But only 1 crafting process can be done at a time: To be able to craft multiple items at once, just create more multiblocks. Additinally, use Crafting Co-Processing Unit to be able to use more machines on your ME Network for one crafting process, and use a Crafting Monitor to have a visual indication of what the multiblock is currently working on - but you can rightclick the multiblock or check the crafting process from a Terminal anyway (by clicking on the wrench at the top right).
